text: The Rajkoti are a Dardic tribal group based in Chitral, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. They speak Kalami, a Dardic language.https://www.peoplegroups.org/explore/GroupDetails.aspx?peid=6394 They live in the valley of Rajkot and Kalkot. == References == Category:Ethnic groups in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Rajkoti people
